alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wicomico and Dorchester Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms 8 miles south of Cambridge, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Hurlock, Hebron, Sharptown, Secretary, Vienna, University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, East New Market, Mardela Springs, Galestown, Church Creek, Brookview, Eldorado, Madison, Andrews, Hudson, Wingate, Lloyds, Taylors Island and Woolford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
